ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who suggests evil thoughts to the hearts of men --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who whispers in the hearts of people;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Those who instil evil thoughts into the hearts of men.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who whispers in the breasts of An-Nas."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who whispers into the hearts of men,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who whispers in the breasts of men
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who whispereth in the hearts of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who whispers into the hearts of people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who whispereth Unto the breasts of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who puts temptations into the breasts of humans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The same) who whispers into the hearts of Mankind,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who whispers in the breasts of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who whispers in the chests of people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who whispers into the hearts of people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [114:5] who whispers in the breasts of mankind, in their hearts — whenever they neglect to remember God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who whispereth in the hearts of mankind) and when Allah is not mentioned, he whispers in the hearts of created beings,
